remarks: If every equivalence class is closed, then the quotient space is T_1 . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 5-Jan-2020.)
statement:
qtopt1.x $e |- X = U. J $.
qtopt1.1 $e |- ( ph -> J e. Fre ) $.
qtopt1.2 $e |- ( ph -> F : X -onto-> Y ) $.
qtopt1.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. Y ) -> ( `' F " { x } ) e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) $.
qtopt1 $p |- ( ph -> ( J qTop F ) e. Fre ) $.
$d F x $.
$d J x $.
$d ph x $.
